mapper.update: update users set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, email, password, role, plan_id, is_active, created_at, updated_at from users
